text.headline: Welcome to your timeline!
text.text: To update this title section and to add events to your timeline just click that little plus button on the top-left.

media.caption: Here's an example event: John Oliver's segment on cryptocurrencies

text.headline: Cryptocurrencies: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
text.text: Digital currencies are generating a lot of excitement. John Oliver enlists Keegan-Michael Key to get potential investors equally excited about the concept of caution.
